33.1. [Josephus Scottus] Commentarii in Isaiam.
Commentary | Isaiah
Manuscripts:
1. Fulda, Landesbibliothek Aa Q.13. saec. x; Weingarten; P: Constance: Bibl. Capit. (S)
2. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek clm 6296, f. 1-201. saec. ix1; Freising.
3. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 1810. saec. xi.
4. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 1811. saec. ix-x; St. Denis.
5. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 12154. saec. ix. O:Corbie; P: St-Germain-des-Prés.
6. Sankt Gallen, Stiftsbibliothek 254. saec. ix2; O: Sankt Gallen
7. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4117 (Weissenburg 33). saec. ix2.
8. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4130 (Weissenburg 49). saec. ix2.
Bibliography:
1. Kelly, Joseph, "The Originality of Josephus Scottus' Commentary on Isaiah," Manuscripta 24 (1980), 176-180.
